results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) is 1/2 * (-1 + Sum_{j=0..k} binomial(2*k,2*j)*(n+1)^(k-j)*n^j).
link: Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: A(n,k) = (T_{k}(2*n+1) - 1)/2 where T_{k}(x) is a Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind.
mathematica: Unprotect[Power]; 0^0 := 1; Protect[Power]; Table[(-1 + Sum[Binomial[2 k, 2 j] (# + 1)^(k - j)*#^j, {j, 0, k}])/2 &[n - k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 01 2019 *)
nmax = 9; row[n_] := LinearRecurrence[{4n+3, -4n-3, 1}, {0, n, 4n(n+1)}, nmax+1]; T = Array[row, nmax+1, 0]; A[n_, k_] := T[[n+1, k+1]];
Table[A[n-k, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 06 2019 *)
